page.title: 18Education
page.content: Over the past decade there have been considerable changes in the organization of the schools within our area.Because of the falling birthrate, not so many schools are needed. This situation has been dealt with in different ways. In 1986,King Edward Infants and King Edward Junior schools will amalgamate to form King Edward Primary School. Amalgamation means two schools together.There used to be 500 pupils now there are 200 pupils.When the schools join together the staff will work together in one staffroom. The classes will just stay the same size,because there would just be the normal amount of children when there is an amalgamation.For a transitional period,both school buildings will be used,eventually the whole school will be taught in one building.
